harvey-legal-assistant.title: Harvey Legal Assistant
harvey-legal-assistant.description: Domain-specific AI for law firms, professional service providers, and the Fortune 500.

factory-intelligence-2-0.title: Factory Intelligence 2.0
factory-intelligence-2-0.description: Modular and customisable manufacturing analytics suite

factory-intelligence.title: Factory Intelligence
factory-intelligence.description: Modular and customisable manufacturing analytics suite

information-assistant.title: Information Assistant
information-assistant.description: A fully customizable GenAI solution that can be tailored to meet specific customer and functional requirements, delivered via secure servers with adaptable design options.​

forecast-plus-dashboard.title: Forecast Plus Dashboard
forecast-plus-dashboard.description: The ideal tool for your AI-based forecasting along the entire value chain. No matter whether you want to use it to forecast your key financial figures, production quantities or personnel requirements.

ai4business.title: AI4Business
ai4business.description: AI solutions and forecasting for any business

genai-explore.title: GenAI Explore
genai-explore.description: An internal platform for to share their GenAI best practices, prompts and playlists.

project-sophia.title: Project Sophia
project-sophia.description: An AI-powered business research canvas where you can ask any business question across every business domain in your organization.

ai-usecase-compass.title: AI Usecase Compass
ai-usecase-compass.description: A wide and continuously expanding overview of Applied AI use cases that helps you understand the potential of applied AI and get inspired on how you can boost your business success using it.

ai-bias-data-visualization.title: AI Bias Data Visualization
ai-bias-data-visualization.description: We often use artificial intelligence (AI) as a way to mitigate bias and streamline our operations. We’re removing the human element from decision making in order to come to a fairer, more accurate result. AI should eliminate any bias from its decisions, right?

google-jules.title: Google Jules
google-jules.description: An async development agent. Jules tackles bugs, small feature requests, and other software engineering tasks, with direct export to GitHub.

google-stitch.title: Google Stitch
google-stitch.description: Stitch generates UIs for mobile and web applications, making design ideation fast and easy.

google-arts-culture-national-gallery-mix.title: Google Arts&Culture National Gallery Mixtape
google-arts-culture-national-gallery-mix.description: Mix a personalized soundtrack inspired by paintings from the National Gallery with the help of Google AI.

google-food-mood.title: Google Food Mood
google-food-mood.description: Get inspiration for your next meal and create new recipes mixing influences from two cuisines, generated with the help of Google AI.

google-little-language-lesson.title: Google Little Language Lesson
google-little-language-lesson.description: A collection of bite-sized learning experiments built with Gemini.

google-illuminate.title: Google Illuminate
google-illuminate.description: Transform your content into engaging AI‑generated audio discussions

google-notebooklm.title: Google NotebookLM
google-notebooklm.description: A research and note-taking online tool developed by Google Labs that uses artificial intelligence (AI), specifically Google Gemini, to assist users in interacting with their documents.
